column4: Landmark Intel judgment critical for other EU antitrust cases

column4: Correction: Fitch Affirms Westpac's Mortgage Covered Bonds at 'AAA'/Stable
column5: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) SYDNEY  September 04 (Fitch) This announcement replaces the version published on 29 August 2017 to include the RMBS Lenders' Mortgage Insurance Rating Criteria that was omitted. Fitch Ratings has affirmed Westpac Banking Corporation's (WBC  AA-/Stable/F1+) AUD27.7 billion of outstanding mortgage covered bonds at 'AAA'. The Outlook is Stable. KEY RATING DRIVERS The rating is based on WBC's Long-Term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) of 'AA-'
